CustomField.description: This field displays the license term on the layout without being editable by anyone. Last update GTMS-978
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(License_Term_CPQ__c)), License_Term_CPQ__c > 0 ), License_Term_CPQ__c, License_Term__c )
CustomField.label: License Term
